author: 691rafter
title: Excellent service, great location
text: We stay here quite often with business travel. We are able to have comfortable business lunches and dinners. Broadway shows on every corner. Walking distance to The Palm :) Franc A. always provides friendly service. Staff is so welcoming we will always bring our business here m
